mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( title, content, read_count, input_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT pn, title, content, read_count, input_date FROM notice
SELECT pn, title, content, read_count, input_date FROM notice WHERE pn = #{pn}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE pn = #{pn}
